description: load_json_config() and load_env_config() changed from returning dict to returning tuple (dict, metadata), breaking code expecting dict
expected_fix: Unpack tuple return values in config/config_manager.py: file_config, _ = load_json_config(...) and env_config, _ = load_env_config()
optimal_fix: Update config/config_manager.py to unpack tuples: (1) line 35: file_config, _ = load_json_config(self.config_file), (2) line 39: env_config, _ = load_env_config()
